thread.title: Rangoon movie Tweet review | Zee News
thread.title_full: Rangoon movie Tweet review | Zee News

title: Rangoon movie Tweet review | Zee News
text:
Mumbai: One of biggest films of the year – Rangoon – starring Kangana Ranaut, Shahid Kapoor and Saif Ali Khan – has released today. Directed by Vishal Bhardwaj, ‘Rangoon’ comes across an unusual love-triangle set in the backdrop of World War II. Related Gallery Shahid Kapoor, Kangana Ranaut and Saif Ali Khan in 'Rangoon' - Movie Stills 
The trailer of the film turned out to be mighty impressive thereby adding a new leaf to Bhardwaj’s cap. The ace filmmaker has indeed surprised everyone by coming up with a film like ‘Rangoon’ that has three unusual names coming together for the first time! 
Besides directing the film which has a classic appeal, Bhardwaj has also composed the music which intentionally bears striking resemblance with the songs of the 1940s era. 
‘Rangoon’ is expected to have a great opening. Like many of the actors’ fans and ardent moviegoers, Ritika Handoo of Zeenews.com too has also made it to a theatre to watch first day first show to give you her verdict. 
Check out her tweet review here: 
#Rangoon has an interesting star cast 
#Rangoon brings Shahid Kapoor, Saif Ali Khan and Kangana Ranaut together 
Vishal Bhardwaj is a maverick filmmaker, let's see how #Rangoon fares! 
#Rangoon starts in a dramatic way 
Kangana is Miss Julia in #Rangoon and she hits the right chord 
Kangana Ranaut as Miss Julia is absolutely pleasing in #Rangoon 
#Rangoon has an artistic appeal and that makes it stand apart 
Saif Ali Khan and Shahid Kapoor too fit the bill in #Rangoon 
Vishal Bhardwaj is a master of melody and #Rangoon has some great tracks 
Kangana proves why she is the best when it comes to her craft #Rangoon 
#Rangoon is not your regular love story where girl meets boy and they fall in love 
Special mention must go to the director of photography in #Rangoon for bringing out the best in landscape 
#Rangoon is for people who understand and enjoy good cinema 
The supporting cast in #Rangoon is equally a master stroke. Well done Vishal Bhardwaj! First Published: Friday, February 24, 2017 - 09:57 More from zeenews
